quote: He was nine years old; he was a child; he he knew his own soul, it was precious to him, he guarded it as the eyelid guards the eye, and without the key of love he let no one into his soul.
quote_letters: HE WAS NINE YEARS OLD HE WAS A CHILD HE HE KNEW HIS OWN SOUL IT WAS PRECIOUS TO HIM HE GUARDED IT AS THE EYELID GUARDS THE EYE AND WITHOUT THE KEY OF LOVE HE LET NO ONE INTO HIS SOUL
